entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
